name: "generate-infographic"
description: "Generate personalized developer infographics, banners, social cards, and profile visuals using AI image generation and template rendering."

---

# Generate Infographic

## Context
Generate visual identity assets for developers based on their GitHub profile analysis. This includes infographics, banners, social cards, and README cover images.

## Asset Types

### 1. Profile Infographic (Primary)
- Dimensions: 1200x630px (og:image compatible)
- Content: Scores radar chart, top languages, archetype badge, AI percentage
- Styles: Dark mode, Light mode, Neon, Minimal, Gradient
- Format: PNG (primary), SVG (optional)

### 2. GitHub Banner
- Dimensions: 1500x500px
- Content: Username, archetype, top 3 languages, activity heatmap miniature
- Optimized for GitHub profile header

### 3. Social Cards
- LinkedIn: 1200x627px
- Twitter/X: 1200x675px
- Content: Name, archetype, key stats, branded footer

### 4. Repository Cover Images
- Dimensions: 1280x640px (GitHub social preview)
- Content: Repo name, primary language, description, star count

## Generation Pipeline
```
Profile Data --> Prompt Orchestrator --> AI Model (text) --> Template Engine
                                                              |
                                                              v
                                                        Renderer (Pillow/Cairo)
                                                              |
                                                              v
                                                        Post-Processing
                                                        (watermark, compress)
                                                              |
                                                              v
                                                        ZIP Packager
```

## Template System
Templates are defined in `backend/skills/templates/`:
- JSON config for layout, colors, fonts
- Jinja2 for text content interpolation
- Pillow/Cairo for rendering
- Each template has a preview thumbnail

## Watermark Rules
- **Free Tier**: "Generated by Git Phantom Scope" watermark (bottom-right, 30% opacity)
- **Pro Tier**: No watermark, or custom branding
- **Enterprise**: Full white-label support

## Quality Standards
- Minimum resolution: 72 DPI for web, 300 DPI for print
- Maximum file size: 2MB per image
- Color profiles: sRGB for web
- Font rendering: Anti-aliased, proper kerning
- Accessibility: Sufficient contrast ratios (WCAG AA)

## Implementation Files
- `backend/services/renderer.py` - Image rendering engine
- `backend/services/packager.py` - ZIP bundle creation
- `backend/skills/templates/` - Template definitions
- `backend/api/v1/routes/generate.py` - Generation endpoint
